name: bookheaven
description: BookHeaven is an online library and reading management system for storing and organizing eBooks. It provides tagging, categorization, user accounts, and sync support through a self-hosted backend.
features: Online Library: Store and organize eBooks in personal cloud library. Digital bookshelf.
Tagging System: Categorize books with flexible tags. Smart organization.
User Accounts: Multi-user support for family or team libraries. Shared reading.
Sync Support: Access your library across all devices. Seamless synchronization.
Self-Hosted Backend: Run on your own infrastructure for privacy. Data control.
Book Management: Add, edit, and organize book metadata. Complete control.
Reading Lists: Create custom lists and collections. Curated reading.
Search Functionality: Find books quickly with powerful search. Instant access.
